thread.title: Fantastic Hotel -
thread.title_full: Fantastic Hotel - Review of Hotel Oceania, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: robertalexander j
title: Fantastic Hotel -
text:
The Oceania is a lovely, quiet, well kept, delightful hotel. Walking distance to museums, the Forum, the Colosseum, shopping on Nazionale, the Trevi fountain, the Spanish Steps more shopping on Via Corso, the Campo di Fiori, the Pantheon, and of course outstanding restaurants. Close to the metro for a quick ride to the Vatican (and more great restaurants). The staff are all outstanding, always willing to help in anyway to ensure your trip and your stay are the very best possible. The rooms are clean and quiet, the breakfast is delicious and the lounge areas very comfortable. We'll be back!
